item.description:
Hello Members,

I am STILL looking for assistant organizers who are responsible and reliable. If you're interested, please read the following criteria/rules/responsibilities.

PLEASE ONLY ATTEND THIS LUNCH IF YOU ARE SERIOUS ABOUT BEING AN ASSISTANT ORGANIZER.

Some of the key responsibilities will include:

1. Each asst. organizer will need to organize regular meetups: a minimum of one meetup per asst. organizer every two months. This will give the members of the group ample opportunity to meet others.

2. Asst. Organizers must be responsible and arrive to meetups on time.

3. Asst. Organizers shall behave in a respectful, non-discriminatory manner to all members of the group. If any conflicts or concerns arise, I must be notified and involved.

4. Meetups cannot be canceled or changed within 48 hours of scheduled time. It will be the asst. organizer's responsibility to contact notify members of changes/cancellations prior to 48 hours.

5. Asst. Organizers cannot add or remove members.

6. Asst. Organizer cannot send spam to any or all members of the group.

7. Asst. Organizers will share the cost of running the meetup: $9 for 3 months per asst. organizer.

8. Asst. Organizers can step down from their position at any time, but must either cancel their meetups at least 48 hours in advance or fulfill their meetup schedule before stepping down.

9. Asst. Organizers should be available via email and respond in a timely manner.

This is not a comprehensive list of duties/rules. It will evolve as we go.

Failure to comply by these rules may result in removing the person as asst. organizer or even as member of the meetup group.

I would like to meet all of you before choosing the final 4 people who will serve as Asst. Organizers.

Thank you.
Tuhina
item.name: Assistant Organizer Lunch
